sections.title: Overview: Hugging Face Transformers vs LlamaIndex
paragraphs: Hugging Face Transformers (nlp) is Open-source library providing thousands of pre-trained transformer models for NLP and vision tasks.. It's known for AI, NLP, Transformers.
LlamaIndex (llms) is Data framework for LLM applications providing tools for ingesting, structuring, and accessing private or domain-specific data.. Users choose it for RAG, Data Framework, LLM.

sections.title: Key Features
